headline: Bear of the Day: AptarGroup (ATR)
summary: AptarGroup's (ATR) stock has been falling due to a mix of legal costs, inventory challenges, analyst downgrades, and weaker demand in certain healthcare markets.

raw.headline: Bear of the Day: AptarGroup (ATR)
raw.summary: AptarGroup's (ATR) stock has been falling due to a mix of legal costs, inventory challenges, analyst downgrades, and weaker demand in certain healthcare markets.

headline: 1 Cash-Producing Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Question
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.

raw.headline: 1 Cash-Producing Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Question
